Attilla:

"Don't press your luck, dwarf" said inside his mind the male and =
told to Preborn with the same tone "Follow me... with whom I have the honor=
?"
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogr=
oups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 3:15 AM
  Subject: Re: It's Showtim=
e


  Prebon looked over Attilla, the oposite bot was slightly taller and m=
ore armored than himself, The former Trainer leader always tried to size up=
 a possible opponent before a fight. "Very well" he said crossing his arms =
tightly in a peturbed fashion, "Then I will ask Shivah about how I AM to be=
 treated." His arms went to his sides and he turned towards the door. "If y=
ou would be so considerate as to introduce us I would be greatfull" He cont=
inued in mock courtesy making a request sound like an order.
    ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
    From: airly2000@... 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
    Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 9:13 AM
    Subject: RE: It's Showti=
me


    Attilla:

    "Nope, it isn't the way " answered  Attilla "What do=
 you think if Shivah solve this trouble... He can explain you what happened=
 Ok?"
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:46 AM
      Su=
bject: Re: It's Showtime


      Prebon stepped out, his memories were eith=
er gone or distorted but his leadership programs were still intact. He reme=
mbered how roughly he was treated and how he was slammed into the CR chambe=
r. To top it off he was always cranky when he woke up. "What is the meaning=
 of this travesty?" he yelled. He saw Predacon emblem on Attilla so he knew=
 thought he wasn't a POW. "Is this any way to treat one of the Predacons be=
st training units?" his record of service would have spoke for itself if he=
 hadn't erased it when he left the Predacons to start his own unit.
       =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: airly2000@... 
        T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 10:01 PM
    =
    Subject: RE: It's Showtime


        Attilla:

        "Memories erased=
, reprogramation ended"thought Attilla "This guy is ready to start duties."=


        Attilla typed some buttons and watied to Cr's door 0pen, "Hey, He=
llo"

        The bot was ready to fight just in case.

f Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
